programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Nandini and Rashmi ask Naitik to go and pay Akshara a surprise visit; Naitik sneaks into Akshara's room and takes her on a romantic walk. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Kullfi Kumarr Bajewala
programme.desc: Kullfi feels out of place at the party; Lovely is worried when she sees Tevar and defends Sikander in front of him. It is revealed that Lovely has a past with Tevar. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Ek Veer Ki Ardaas... Veera
programme.desc: Rannvijay cares for his half-sister Veera and raises her on his own after his father, the sarpanch of the village, abandons her. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Radha Krishn
programme.desc: Krishna rescues Radha from Kans's army and gets rid of them; Kans learns about Krishna and is determined to kill him; Radha reaches home and finds Krishna in her house. (TV Show - Mythology)

programme.title: Ek Hazaaron Mein Meri Behna Hai
programme.desc: Virat overhears Manvi's plan to get him and Maya closer and gets angry. Later, Manvi follows Virat but gets light-headed and faints on the road. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: When Nikhil's friends ask for alcohol, Shaurya arranges it for them; Rituraj and his friends mock Naitik for refusing to drink alcohol. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: During the celebrations, Paritosh is left ecstatic to see Kinjal dressed up traditionally. Meanwhile, Kavya becomes jealous after seeing Vanraj and Anupamaa together. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Chahatein
programme.desc: Rudraksh uncovers a startling fact and Vasudha learns about Yuvraj's plan. Later, Saaransh's visit takes Rudraksh by surprise. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Mann Kee Awaaz Pratigya
programme.desc: Kesar informs Krishna that he was wrong to hit Pratigya while Adarsh consoles Pratigya and gets amazed when Komal hugs him. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Swarag Se Sunder
programme.desc: Two brothers struggle to keep their family together as external forces like the younger brother's father-in-law try to break them apart. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Chhoti Bahu
programme.desc: Radha gets married to Dr. Madhu, who later finds out that she has a serious illness, which can be cured after she has a child. Will the marriage be annulled. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Dabangg
programme.desc: Chulbul Pandey is a cop who has his own way of dealing with corruption. His detractor Cheddi Singh manages to create a rift between Chulbul and his step-brother and uses it to his advantage. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Humshakals
programme.desc: Ashok and Kumar are best friends. While Ashok's rich father lies in coma, his uncle, Mamaji, tries to take over his property. Mamaji gets Ashok and Kumar sent to an asylum. Mix-ups ensue when Ashok and Kumar's lookalikes who are being treated at the same asylum are released eventually. Mamaji decides to use the duplicate Ashok to further his plans to take over his property. Meanwhile, the real Ashok and Kumar find a duplicate Mamaji in the asylum and try to break free. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Bewafa Sanam
programme.desc: Popular cricketer Sunder's (Krishna Kumar) rival wants to bring an end to his cricketing career and sends goons after him. Sundar retaliates and thrashes them, but is arrested and put behind bars. He learns that his fiancee Sheetal has been cheating on him and is due marry his arch-enemy. Enraged, he goes to the venue of the wedding and shoots her in full public view. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Gunday
programme.desc: Childhood friends Bikram and Bala aspire to take over the coal mafia. However, they fall in love with the same woman, Nandita, which leads to a rift forming between the two. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ek Villain
programme.desc: Director Mohit Suri crafts a devastating tale of love, revenge and sacrifice in 'Ek Villain', with Sidharth Malhotra playing Guru in a role completely opposite to his chocolate boy image. Guru becomes the embodiment of grief when he finds his girlfriend Aisha, played by the immaculate Shraddha Kapoor, murdered by a serial killer. Allowing his past to take hold of him, Guru sets out to find the murderer, played out with much ruthlessness by Riteish Deshmukh. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Chandni
programme.desc: Chandni's fiance is paralysed in an accident and she's forced to start afresh. Her boss falls in love with her and she agrees to marry him. She faces a dilemma when her fiance returns to her life. (Film - Romance)

programme.title: Mr. Bechara
programme.desc: Anand is a shy printer and a single father to his infant son. After his wife's death, he leads a quiet life. However, his peaceful life is shattered by strange beliefs of Dr. Dayanand, a medical man with unorthodox techniques. Reeling under pressure, he agrees to Dr. Dayanand's idea of pretending to be the husband of an amnesia patient. However, the doctor's lies tumble out soon. (Film - Romance)

programme.title: Action Jackson
programme.desc: Prabhu Deva, the very fexible dancer turned choreographer turned director, recruits Ajay Devgn to be the main lead in the movie 'Action Jackson'. The brooding and ridiculously talented Devgn portrays the role of Vishi, a petty felon who suffers the misfortune of looking like a Bangkok based hit man, AJ. The music for the film was composed by the versatile Himesh Reshammiya who has even sung a few songs. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Supreme Khiladi
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler

programme.title: Balloon
programme.desc: Jeeva, an aspiring director, is asked to write a horror comedy. He rents out a place with his wife and nephew that is close to a haunted house for inspiration. But the family begins experiencing supernatural phenomena and Jeeva soon learns that the events are connected to his past. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: The State vs. Jolly LL.B 2
programme.desc: A lawyer hoodwinks a woman to start his own law firm. However, he feels guilty and tries to make things right when he finds out that she commits suicide for failing to get justice for her husband. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Panga
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Taarzan: The Wonder Car
programme.desc: A young man converts his father's old car into an amazing wonder car named Tarzan. The car comes alive as it is possessed by his father's spirit. Soon, it also starts killing his father's murderers. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Himmatwala
programme.desc: The official remake of Himmatwala (1983), this movie revolves around Ravi, who returns to Ramnagar from the city to his mother Savitri and sister Padma. Learning that Sher Singh, the local zamindar, caused his father's death, Ravi tries to kill Sher Singh but fails. Padma is in love with Sher Singh's manager Narayan Das's son, Shakti. Sher Singh and Narayan Das plot to use this to their advantage, but by falling in love with Ravi, will Rekha, Sher Singh's daughter, turn the tables around. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Junglee
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Singham Returns
programme.desc: Bajirao Singham, an honest police officer, encounters Babaji, a god-man with connections to high profile politicians, when he investigates the death of an officer from his team. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Blood Lake: Attack of the Killer Lampreys
programme.desc: After a small lake town is attacked by mutated, blood-sucking lampreys, an animal control specialist takes on the responsibility to bring the situation under control and protect his family. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Talvar
programme.desc: A hardened cop deals with three conflicting perspectives involving a brutal double murder. The case is complicated as the prime suspects are the parents who supposedly killed their teenaged daughter. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Ekk Albela
programme.desc: Bhagwan Dada comes from humble beginnings and dreams of becoming a superstar. Years later, he becomes a legend in Indian Cinema. (Film - Biography/Biopic)

programme.title: Shabri
programme.desc: Shabri, a woman who runs a flour mill, kills a cop who tortures her brother and tries to rape her. When her brother is killed, she is forced to become a gangster so that she can avenge his death. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Train: Some Lines Should Never Be Crossed...
programme.desc: Vishal's marriage to Anjali begins to crumble when he meets Roma, also married, on a train and falls in love with her. However, someone knows his secret and wants to expose him at any cost. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Khosla Ka Ghosla
programme.desc: Kamal Khosla's land is grabbed by a thug named Khurana. In a bid to retrieve their land, Khosla's son Cherry and his friends step in armed with a clever plan to fool the crook. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: Aisha, a stylish and confident spinster, plays matchmaker for her friends and relatives. Arjun, a friend, advises her to stop meddling with others' lives, but she ignores his tip. While trying to set up Shefali, an innocent girl, with Randhir, Aisha ends up ruining her relationship with other friends. She realises her mistake and Arjun helps her overcome her personal struggle. Aisha finally apologises to her friends and realises her love for Arjun. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Stanley Ka Dabba
programme.desc: Stanley is a diligent school boy who loves to be in the company of his friends. However, a teacher in the school forces students to share their food with him. Stanley is the only one who does not carry a lunch box. In the beginning, several children share their food with him but after the teacher realises this, he is banned from attending school until he brings his own lunch box. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Mona Darling
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths occur on a campus where the victims die immediately after accepting a friend request from Mona Darling, a page on social media. Strangely, the owner of the page also goes missing. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Dolly Ki Doli
programme.desc: Dolly, a con woman, marries rich men only to run away with their wealth on the wedding night. After a series of such heists, a local policeman, Robin Singh, teams up with her victims to catch her. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Yaariyan
programme.desc: Lakshya, Jia, Saloni, Pardy and Neil are college students who study in a campus in Sikkim. Together they spend many unforgettable moments. However, they soon realise that the land their college has been built on has been taken over by an Australian businessman who wants to build a casino there. He challenges the five friends to take part in a competition and defeat a group of Australian students. If they can successfully do so, he will lease their college land for hundred years. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: A Gentleman: Sundar, Susheel, Risky
programme.desc: Gaurav wants to marry Kavya, but she prefers someone who is more adventurous. But when the white-collared gentleman lands in Mumbai for an assignment, he is mistaken for Rishi, a spy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Sarkar Raj
programme.desc: Anita, the CEO of Sheppard power plant, an international company, brings a power plant proposal to set up in rural Maharashtra before the Nagres, insightful Shankar (Abhishek Bachchan)is quick to realize the benefits the power plant can bring to the people. After convincing Sarkar (Amitabh Bachchan)who is against it for various reasons, Shankar undertakes a journey along with Anita (Aishwariya Rai)to the villages of Maharashtra to mobilize support from the masses. (Film - Crime)

programme.title: Mukti Bhawan
programme.desc: Daya wishes to attain salvation in the ghats of Varanasi and takes his son, Rajiv, along with him. As days pass, Daya finds a companion in a widow while Rajiv is left in a state of dilemma. (Film - Drama)

programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: Taking up from where the 2012 movie of the 'Madagascar' franchise left off, Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private find themselves in Italy, all set for a new adventure. Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Conrad Vernon and Christopher Knights give their voices to the four delightful penguins who join forces with a spy organisation, The North Wind, and gear up to impede the evil Dr. Octavius Brine from exterminating the world. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless find themselves in a new battle against a mysterious Dragon Rider, Drago. He wants to start a war using the dragons to rule the world. The two, along with their friends, must stand up and fight against Drago together if they want to change the future for both humans and dragons. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A blacksmith joins forces with Captain Jack Sparrow, a pirate, in a bid to free the love of his life from Jack's associates, who kidnapped her suspecting she has the medallion. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: Lucy, Edmund and Eustace are stranded in Cambridge. They return to Narnia where they meet Prince Caspian. He explains to them that in the while that they were away, the face of Narnia has changed. Together, they realise that their homeland is under threat from green mist. They set out to find Lord Telmar, a close confidante of Caspian's father, in order to restore peace. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Young Mulan is distraught to learn that her weak father must join the army to fight the invading Huns. Unwilling to endanger his life, she disguises herself as a man and joins the army in his place. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Talvar
programme.desc: A hardened cop deals with three conflicting perspectives involving a brutal double murder. The case is complicated as the prime suspects are the parents who supposedly killed their teenaged daughter. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Ekk Albela
programme.desc: Bhagwan Dada comes from humble beginnings and dreams of becoming a superstar. Years later, he becomes a legend in Indian Cinema. (Film - Biography/Biopic)

programme.title: Shabri
programme.desc: Shabri, a woman who runs a flour mill, kills a cop who tortures her brother and tries to rape her. When her brother is killed, she is forced to become a gangster so that she can avenge his death. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Train: Some Lines Should Never Be Crossed...
programme.desc: Vishal's marriage to Anjali begins to crumble when he meets Roma, also married, on a train and falls in love with her. However, someone knows his secret and wants to expose him at any cost. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Khosla Ka Ghosla
programme.desc: Kamal Khosla's land is grabbed by a thug named Khurana. In a bid to retrieve their land, Khosla's son Cherry and his friends step in armed with a clever plan to fool the crook. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: Aisha, a stylish and confident spinster, plays matchmaker for her friends and relatives. Arjun, a friend, advises her to stop meddling with others' lives, but she ignores his tip. While trying to set up Shefali, an innocent girl, with Randhir, Aisha ends up ruining her relationship with other friends. She realises her mistake and Arjun helps her overcome her personal struggle. Aisha finally apologises to her friends and realises her love for Arjun. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Stanley Ka Dabba
programme.desc: Stanley is a diligent school boy who loves to be in the company of his friends. However, a teacher in the school forces students to share their food with him. Stanley is the only one who does not carry a lunch box. In the beginning, several children share their food with him but after the teacher realises this, he is banned from attending school until he brings his own lunch box. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Mona Darling
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths occur on a campus where the victims die immediately after accepting a friend request from Mona Darling, a page on social media. Strangely, the owner of the page also goes missing. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Dolly Ki Doli
programme.desc: Dolly, a con woman, marries rich men only to run away with their wealth on the wedding night. After a series of such heists, a local policeman, Robin Singh, teams up with her victims to catch her. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Yaariyan
programme.desc: Lakshya, Jia, Saloni, Pardy and Neil are college students who study in a campus in Sikkim. Together they spend many unforgettable moments. However, they soon realise that the land their college has been built on has been taken over by an Australian businessman who wants to build a casino there. He challenges the five friends to take part in a competition and defeat a group of Australian students. If they can successfully do so, he will lease their college land for hundred years. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: A Gentleman: Sundar, Susheel, Risky
programme.desc: Gaurav wants to marry Kavya, but she prefers someone who is more adventurous. But when the white-collared gentleman lands in Mumbai for an assignment, he is mistaken for Rishi, a spy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Sarkar Raj
programme.desc: Anita, the CEO of Sheppard power plant, an international company, brings a power plant proposal to set up in rural Maharashtra before the Nagres, insightful Shankar (Abhishek Bachchan)is quick to realize the benefits the power plant can bring to the people. After convincing Sarkar (Amitabh Bachchan)who is against it for various reasons, Shankar undertakes a journey along with Anita (Aishwariya Rai)to the villages of Maharashtra to mobilize support from the masses. (Film - Crime)

programme.title: Mukti Bhawan
programme.desc: Daya wishes to attain salvation in the ghats of Varanasi and takes his son, Rajiv, along with him. As days pass, Daya finds a companion in a widow while Rajiv is left in a state of dilemma. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Imlie
programme.desc: Imlie, a smart village belle, is forced to marry a journalist after they seek shelter in a hut during heavy rains. On reaching the city, she realises that her husband is engaged to be married. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Naitik tells Mohit that he is afraid Sneha's mother will tell Dadaji; Naitik tries to pacify Akshara but she refuses to talk to him. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Kavitha and Praveen decide to get a divorce as Praveen cannot be a father; Shankari tells Naitik that Sneha's mother wants to talk to him about Sneha's marriage. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Blacklist

programme.title: How To Get Away With Murder
programme.desc: Gabriel is the first chair on a case defending a teacher involved in a school shooting. Meanwhile, Oliver makes a shocking confession. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha encounter many obstacles and a new threat while trying to return to Alexandria. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Unaware that he has an eight-year-old daughter, quarterback Joe Kingman transforms from an egotistical bachelor into a loving father when the child suddenly enters his life. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: An unmanned, half-mile-long freight train hurtles towards a town at breakneck speed. An engineer and a young conductor, who happen to be on the same route, must race against time to try and stop it. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world, cities ride on wheels and devour each other in order to survive. A woman named Hester Shaw rises to stop a large predator city and finds support in an outcast apprentice historian of London called Tom Natsworthy and a dangerous outlaw, Anna Fang. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a chef, oblivious to the fact that the profession is phobic to rodents. But the ambitious creature partners with garbage boy Linguini and the duo set a fine-dining restaurant in Paris ablaze with their culinary skills. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: After Scrat's pursuit of an acorn sets off a series of asteroids to strike Earth, Manny, Sid, Diego and their herd must find a way to survive the impending doom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Having earned himself a reputation, Van Helsing is a monster hunter known to destroy all forms of evil. His latest mission is in Transylvania where he teams up with Anna to defeat Count Dracula. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: A decade after his father's death in the Battle of the Breach, Jake Pentecost forfeits his Jaeger training and makes a living off the black market. But the rise of a new Kaiju threat finds him teaming up with his adoptive sister, Mako Mori, co-pilot Nate Lambert and 15-year-old Jaeger enthusiast Amara Namani to prevent a global catastrophe. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Unaware that he has an eight-year-old daughter, quarterback Joe Kingman transforms from an egotistical bachelor into a loving father when the child suddenly enters his life. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: After his son, Nemo, gets abducted in the Great Barrier Reef and is despatched to a fish tank in a dentist's office in Sydney, Marlin, a meek clownfish, embarks on a journey to bring him home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas

programme.title: Baskets

programme.title: Baskets
programme.desc: Martha is worried that Chip may be upset and decides to look for him. Later, Christine visits Martha in the hospital and is appalled to learn about Chip's condominium. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: Sierra is overwhelmed as she struggles to balance her career with being a single mother. In the meantime, Helen begins to focus on herself. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Reddington sacrifices himself to secure his future with Anne and to get Townsend off their back. Later, he escapes to Anne's house and finds a surprise. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: How To Get Away With Murder
programme.desc: A mysterious accident leads Bonnie to a hard realisation. In the meantime, the students compete for a large cash bonus during the final exam. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Alexandria is finally able to start pulling itself back together. There is peace between the group and the Alexandrians. But no one knows how long it will last. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain Marvel
programme.desc: In 1995, Starforce member Vers and her team are sent to Earth in order to rescue an undercover operative infiltrating the Skrulls, the shapeshifters. During her mission, Vers gets separated from her team and is stranded on Earth. She meets S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent Nick Fury and with his help finds out that she had a life on Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and his family embark on a journey to search for a new place to live after their cave is destroyed. A young boy helps them trek through unknown places to find new shelter. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim gets jealous when his parents give all their attention to his little brother. Tim soon learns that the baby can talk and the two team up to foil the plans of the CEO of Puppy Co. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: In this computer-animated science-fiction comedy, an alien race, The Boov, invade Earth and relocate the inhabitants whom they consider inferior to themselves. On the other hand, Tip Tucci, a young girl, avoids getting captured during the invasion and teams up with Oh on a mission to find her mother. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Life Of Pi
programme.desc: Celebrated director Ang Lee conjures spectacular images out of Yann Martel's bestseller of the same name and presents this story of endurance and self-discovery in which Pi (Suraj Sharma), a young man, finds himself between a rock and a hard place when he survives a disastrous shipwreck, only to discover that his life boat has another passenger, a ferocious Bengal tiger called Richard Parker. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Commodus takes over power and demotes Maximus, one of the preferred generals of his father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius. As a result, Maximus is relegated to fighting till death as a gladiator. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Oz The Great And Powerful
programme.desc: Oscar Diggs, a magician, works in a travelling circus in Kansas. Known to have a reputation of being a womaniser, Oscar falls in love with the circus strongman's wife. Fearing that he may be caught, he escapes in a hot air balloon. A strong tornado sweeps his balloon to the Land of Oz where he meets Theodora, a naive witch. Theodora assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor, the Wicked Witch. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A few Jewish soldiers are on an undercover mission to bring down the Nazi government and put an end to the war. Meanwhile, a woman wants to avenge the death of her family from a German officer. (Film - War)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin when he is wrongly framed in a CIA operation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: John Carter
programme.desc: John Carter finds himself transported to Mars, where he learns about his superhuman capabilities. Things take a turn when he rescues a princess who is on the run. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin who suffers from amnesia, sets out to track down a CIA official whilst trying to retain memories of a forgotten past. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Thomas loses his memory and finds himself trapped in a massive maze called the Glade. He and his friends try to escape from the maze and eventually learn that they are subjects of an experiment. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Better Things
programme.desc: After a trip from visiting their father, Frankie and Duke are picked up by Sam and Phil from the airport. Later, Sam comforts Rich whose boyfriend broke up with him. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: Better Things
programme.desc: Sam discovers that the show she lent her voice to is getting a reboot. In the meantime, her children have bought a chinchilla with her credit card. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: Joanie becomes acquainted with EJ, an epigenetic scientist, while in Montauk for work. The two explore Joanie's family history, during which Joanie discovers the truth about her mother's death. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: A determined Liz plot's Reddington's downfall meticulously by teaming up with his worst enemy. Later, she has dreams of Mr Kaplan guiding her towards her goal. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: How To Get Away With Murder
programme.desc: Oliver gifts Asher, Connor and Michaela something unexpected. Later, Annalise learns some disturbing news and Michaela receives a surprise phone call. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After having a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria yet again. However, this time, the threat might be too big to defeat. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: When a secret agent learns of his wife's extra-marital affair, he pursues her, while at the same time he tries to pin-down terrorists in possession of nuclear missiles. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Childhood friends Rafe and Danny become army pilots and meet Evelyn, a navy nurse. However, the three of them later find themselves in the middle of the attack on Pearl Harbour during World War II. (Film - War)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
programme.desc: With the help of a special, magical dagger that can help reverse time, a young prince and a princess must stop an evil villain whose actions threaten to destroy the world. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Zootopia
programme.desc: When Judy Hopps, a rookie officer in the Zootopia Police Department, sniffs out a sinister plot, she enlists the help of a con artist to solve the case in order to prove her abilities to Chief Bogo, who doesn't trust her very much. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Gru meets his long-lost twin brother Dru, after getting fired from the Anti-Villain League. However, the siblings find themselves at loggerheads with a child actor-turned-villain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Thomas loses his memory and finds himself trapped in a massive maze called the Glade. He and his friends try to escape from the maze and eventually learn that they are subjects of an experiment. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A blacksmith joins forces with Captain Jack Sparrow, a pirate, in a bid to free the love of his life from Jack's associates, who kidnapped her suspecting she has the medallion. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: A Brush With Love
programme.desc: (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Toby and his brother Tanner, an ex-convict, resort to robbing banks as they can't afford their mortgage payments anymore. Everything goes as planned until the police is hot on their trail. (Film - Crime)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Spies In Disguise
programme.desc: Lance Sterling, a secret agent, finds himself transformed into a pigeon. He then sets out with his associate Walter to stop a villain who is using Sterling's disguise to carry out a dangerous plan. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An alien race destroys major cities of the world with their advanced weaponry. However, a geek, a pilot, the US President and a group of ragtag survivors unite to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Ariel, a mermaid, flouts rules of the mermaid kingdom and gets fascinated with the human world. When she meets Prince Eric, she falls in love with him and resolves to find a way to be with him. In the process, she ends up striking a dangerous deal with Ursula, a sea witch. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.desc: A determined Liz plot's Reddington's downfall meticulously by teaming up with his worst enemy. Later, she has dreams of Mr Kaplan guiding her towards her goal. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: Better Things
programme.desc: As Lenny and Lala are both in the middle of getting a divorce from their husbands, Sam takes them to her lawyer. Later, Jeff apologises for the things he has done to Sam. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: Better Things
programme.desc: Before going to the doctor, Sam arrives at Phil's house and gives him a DNA test. Meanwhile, Duke accidentally slams the door on Pepper's hand. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: To prepare for the wedding, Whitney and Noah travel to Montauk. Later, Noah receives a concerning call from Petra, a reporter. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: When Reddington gets wind that Liz is after his cypher machine, he uses the task force to his advantage. Later, Ressler tries to help Liz prove a point to Townsend. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: How To Get Away With Murder
programme.desc: Michaela and Connor are booked on murder charges following Asher's death and must make the most difficult decision of their lives. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: With walkers inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the group are scared and outnumbered. Things are only getting worse. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: War veteran Will Sawyer is entrusted with the task of assessing the security of a high-profile building in China. He gets framed when aides of an international terrorist hack into the security system of the building. Sawyer then struggles to prove his innocence and save his family trapped in the fire. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: A soft-hearted bull, Ferdinand, escapes from Casa del Toro after his father does not return from the bullfight. However, due to a turn of events, he is taken back to the place he escaped from. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The Alpha Omega, a paramilitary faction, attacks Caesar's clan, killing his wife and the oldest son. Angered, Caeser rallies his army to take revenge from Colonel, the man behind the faction. Battling his own dark instincts, he decides to lead a final confrontation that will determine the future of the planet. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: The third film in this animation franchise follows Lightning McQueen, who enlists the help of race technician Cruz Ramirez to get back in the racing game after the rise of a younger, faster generation of racers. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Night At The Museum: Secret Of The Tomb
programme.desc: The endearing museum security guard Larry Daley discovers that the Tablet of Ahkmenrah is corroding and the exhibits will not be able to come to life at night. After learning that the secret to restoring it lies with Ahkmenrah's parents, he sets out on a wild adventure across the globe to save the museum's precious inhabitants. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Director genius Matthew Vaughn brings a boisterous and visually engaging tale portraying the origins of the mutant community, packed with talented stars like James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Nicholas Hoult, Jennifer Lawrence and January Jones. Set in the backdrop of the Cuban Missile Crisis in 1962, a group of X-men discover their bizarre and formidable powers, which helps them fight against the ruthless dictator who's waiting to wage a war against the man- and mutant-kind. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Oz The Great And Powerful
programme.desc: Oscar Diggs, a magician, works in a travelling circus in Kansas. Known to have a reputation of being a womaniser, Oscar falls in love with the circus strongman's wife. Fearing that he may be caught, he escapes in a hot air balloon. A strong tornado sweeps his balloon to the Land of Oz where he meets Theodora, a naive witch. Theodora assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor, the Wicked Witch. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins dons the role of a sophisticated CIA agent who tries to transform a street punk (Chris Rock) into a savvy spy after the death of his twin brother. They must together save their city from terrorists. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Lucy Cola, an astronaut, returns to Earth from her first space mission and begins to feel disconnected from normal life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: An American news crew lands in Burundi to capture footage of a deadly crocodile. However, a violent warlord who stalks the region makes them his target. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Sam misses his father, a virtual world designer, and enters a virtual space that has become much more dangerous than his father intended. Now, both father and son embark upon a life-and-death journey. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: As Steve Rogers battles to accept his role in the modern globe, he joins forces with another super soldier, the Black Widow, to fight against a fresh peril, a killer known as the Winter Soldier. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Jungle Book

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: The iconic voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, will.i.am and Jamie Foxx come together in this adventure comedy, 'Rio', which circles around a male macaw, Blu, who is uprooted from his domesticated life and taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female of his species, Jewel, and save his kind from extinction. However, when the macaws are kidnapped by smugglers there, they befriend other birds who help them in their adventurous journey towards freedom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)
